info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 27 at 3:25PM MDT until April 27 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southeastern Otero County in south central New Mexico... Hudspeth County in western Texas...
* Until 730 PM MDT.
* At 325 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Fort Quitman.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 50 mph.
SOURCE...Department of Transportation Officials.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 63 and 134.
Locations impacted include... Fort Quitman, Indio Mountains Research Station, Esperanza, Little Box, Fort Hancock, Sunset Ranches, Acala, Round Top Mountain, Green River, Sierra Blanca, Far Western Portions of Guadalupe Mountains National Park, Indian Hot Springs, Big Box, McNary, Brokeoff Mountains, Bosque Bonita, Gypsum Dunes at Guadalupe National Park, Frenchman Canyon, Finlay, and Dell City.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 7:30 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 7:30 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:30 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:30 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
